title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Generative and Agentic AI on Amazon EKS (CNS344)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 在 Amazon EKS 上的生成式和代理式 AI (CNS344)
abstract: AI is creating new opportunities, and organizations need speed-to-market, scalability, performance, and cost efficiency to bring ideas to life. Amazon EKS provides the trusted and flexible foundation for your AI journey as you build new experiences using AI inference, agents, and model fine-tuning. In this session, we will cover recent innovations in Amazon EKS that empower you with the latest AI capabilities and we will share real-world architectures, best practices, and examples to leave you equipped with the information you need to accelerate your AI initiatives.
abstract_cn: 人工智能正在创造新的机遇，组织需要快速上市、可扩展性、性能和成本效益来将想法变为现实。Amazon EKS 为您的 AI 之旅提供值得信赖且灵活的基础，帮助您使用 AI 推理、代理和模型微调构建新体验。在本次会议中，我们将介绍 Amazon EKS 的最新创新，这些创新为您提供最新的 AI 能力，我们还将分享真实世界的架构、最佳实践和示例，让您掌握加速 AI 计划所需的信息。
